entry.def: If you are punctual, you do something or arrive somewhere at the right time and are not late.

example.ex: He's always very punctual. I'll see if he's here yet.
example.tran: 他总是很准时。我去看看他是否已经来了。

means.word_mean: 1. the quality or habit of adhering to an appointed time

auth_sentence.content: Rail regulators said that punctuality had worsened since June.
auth_sentence.res_content: Rail regulators said that punctuality had worsened since June.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Rail regulators said that punctuality had worsened since June.

auth_sentence.content: Both of them shared a love of punctuality and order.

auth_sentence.content: His hobby is watching cricket, he said, and his strength is punctuality.
auth_sentence.res_content: His hobby is watching cricket, he said, and his strength is punctuality.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His hobby is watching cricket, he said, and his strength is punctuality.

stems_affixes.word_buile: punct点,变尖,指,针+ilious→[做事]点滴不漏→小心的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 严守时刻的,准时的,正点的
stems_affixes.word_buile: punct点,变尖,指,针+ual……的→到点上→准点的
pung=punct点,变尖,指,针+ent……的→尖的→尖锐的
acu尖+punct点+ure表名词→用尖[针]点→针炙
com全部+punct点,变尖,指,针+ion表名词→全身像针刺一样→懊悔
punctual[adj.严守时刻的,准时的,正点的]+ity表名词→n.准时
punctuate[v.加标点于;不时打断]+ion表名词→punctuation标点
punct点,变尖,指,针+ure表名词→点[进去]→刺穿
punct点,变尖,指,针+uate=ate表动词→加上点→加标点
punct点,变尖,指,针+ure表名词→点[进去]→刺穿

sentences.en: He gave the child a lecture on the importance of punctuality.
sentences.cn: 他教训孩子们严守时间的重要性。

sentences.en: He’s been taken to task for his habitual lack of punctuality.
sentences.cn: 他因为经常不准时而受到批评。

sentences.en: Punctuality is essential in the business world.
sentences.cn: 在商界严守时间至关重要。
